articles.description: Google now offers amazing 3D augmented reality animals and objects on nearly any iPhone, iPad, or Android phone. You can find them with a quick search on Chrome. Using Google’s ARCore technology, you can study realistic-looking objects in the world around you.

articles.title: Say hello to Ford's 1400bhp electric Mustang - Top Gear
articles.description: The Cobra Jet 1400 Prototype should “crush” the ¼-mile in about eight seconds
